title: Band, "Bands", 800–1000
medium:
Material: cotton, wool
Technique: tapestry weave, slit and single interlock
description: A) Narrow band patterned by birds and bird heads in yellow, ivory and blue. Outlined in black on a red background. B) Narrow band patterned by foxes, a bird and geometric shapes in yellow, ivory and blue, outlined in black on a red background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band, "Bands", 800–1000.Material: cotton, wool
Technique: tapestry weave, slit and single interlock. 1969-170-6-a.
